title: Erroneous values when using percentage on operation encased in parentheses
body:
**Describe the bug**
When using percentage on an operation done between parentheses, the value comes out incorrect. I tried the same operation on multiple calculators and they all give the same answer but on this calculator.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Click on "("
2. Click on "5"
3. Click on "4"
4. Click on ")"
5. Click on "%"
6. Observe error.

**Expected behavior**
The operation (5+4)% should display 0.09.

**Screenshots/videos**
![bugincalc](https://github.com/Darkempire78/OpenCalc/assets/101996937/3c07bf0a-9173-48bc-9141-a207c88c6d4f)

**Smartphone (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Pixel_3a_API_34_extension_level_7_arm64-v8a
 - OS: Android 14.0
 - App version: latest
 - Language [e.g English]
